supplyDemandQuery.title: transport final energy by tech (new)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='transportation' or (exists(child::keyword[@final-energy='transportation'])))]/ *[@type='subsector']/*[@type='technology']/ *[@type='input' and not (@name='renewable') and not(contains(@name,'trn_'))]/ demand-physical[@vintage=parent::*/parent::*/@year]/node()
